headline: NORWEGIAN CRUISE LINE® NAMES AWARD-WINNING ACTOR, ERIC STONESTREET, AS GODFATHER TO ITS NEWEST SHIP, NORWEGIAN AQUA™
summary: Norwegian Cruise Line (NCL), the innovator in global cruise travel, today announced that the two-time Emmy® Award-winning actor, Eric Stonestreet, will serve as the godfather of NCL's newest groundbreaking ship, Norwegian Aqua, launching in April 2025.

headline: BALY Receives Shareholders' Nod for the Queen Casino Buyout
